Helpers module

Helpers.run_parallel_generations(works)[source]

Executes a list of functions in parallel, each with its own set of arguments.

This function uses Python’s concurrent.futures module to run multiple functions in parallel, utilizing multiple CPU cores for increased efficiency.

Parameters:

works (List[Tuple[Callable, Any]]) – A list where each tuple contains a function and its arguments.

Returns:

None

Return type:

NoneType

Helpers.write_csv(path, data)[source]

Writes data to a CSV file at the specified path.

Parameters:

  • path (str) – The file path where the CSV should be written.

  • data (List[List]) – The data to write to the CSV file, where each inner list represents a row.

Returns:

None

Return type:

NoneType
